statements: UPDATE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE post_id = 1
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics SET shares = 75, engagement_rate = 0.08 WHERE post_id = 2
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics SET likes = likes + 10, shares = shares + 5 WHERE post_id = 12345;
UPDATE SocialMediaEngagementMetrics SET comments = comments + 3, engagement_rate = engagement_rate * 1.2 WHERE post_id = 54321;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE platform = 'Instagram' AND post_id = '12345';
UPDATE influencer_impact SET engagement_rate = 5.7, impact_score = 85 WHERE influencer_id = 1001 AND brand_id = 2003;

UPDATE Social_Media_Engagement_Metrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE platform = 'Instagram' AND post_date = '2022-01-15';
